overview: The Socal group inc is a common name in the world of promotion and marketing related services. The company boasts of a diversified clientele including clients of every class, section and stature. Starting from the privately held small businesses to the globally operating leading multi nationals, clients from every industrial sector can be found in their service list which itself reveals their professional expertise and reputation. http://www.1888pressrelease.com/the-socal-group-volunteers-at-the-boys-and-girls-club-silent-pr-254301.html
